text:
@PressSec Here's a Mother and Daughter that died hours apart from the Trump Virus. That's 2 people out of 130,000 so far. Why isn't Trump doing anything to help prevent either family's loss? Campaigning is only spreading coronavirus, not helping a single bit.
https://t.co/8aSM1nsR7E
